rationale: The segment contains calming cues (food safety, preparedness/capability) and describes actions.
The segment describes food safety assurance and surveillance program/actions.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports a factual outcome ('will not enter the food system') and boasts about surveillance ('strongest AI surveillance program') but lacks explicit calming language about public safety.
Segment contains bare negation and preparedness/action, not minimiser + scale contrast.
